about_the_game:
Volatile Triangle combines the best aspects of many genres to produce something truly unique. Hardcore puzzle platforming coupled with a trajectory based movement system means the main challenge is simply collecting all of the orbs and getting through the portal without dying. The added challenge of getting a perfect score using the least amount of moves possible will keep you busy for a long time. Getting a perfect score will not be easy to achieve and will take an absolute understanding of the game. Understanding the game is something you will have to work for, there is no writing on the wall or hints to guide you. You will have to earn it with every death.

Prepare yourself.

Features:
-96 levels to master
-Semi-linear progression system allows you to skip tougher levels and come back when your skills are sharpened
-Gravity Switches, Portals, Lasers and more will interact in unexpected ways to form mind bending puzzles
-Control sharing multiplayer makes it easy to enjoy the challenge with your friends
-Play wherever you want with cloud saves and full controller support
-19 Achievements. Achievement hunters beware! These will take some work
-Awesome up-beat soundtrack

highlighted.name: The real challenge has just begun.

short_description: Volatile Triangle is a hardcore turn based puzzle platformer. Prepare yourself for a challenge as these deceptively simple puzzles will require more then just good aim. Memorization, accuracy and problem solving will be your only friends along the way, oh... and you will die.... alot.
